# c-login-card

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute             | Description                                   | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Default          |
| -------------------- | --------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------- |
| `backgroundPosition` | `background-position` | Background position (css background-position) | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `'bottom right'` |
| `mobileBreakpoint`   | `mobile-breakpoint`   | Mobile breakpoint in pixels                   | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `600`            |
| `overlay`            | `overlay`             | Add colored overlay to the background image   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `false`          |
| `overlayBlendMode`   | `overlay-blend-mode`  | Add colored overlay to the background image   | `"color" \| "color-burn" \| "color-dodge" \| "darken" \| "difference" \| "exclusion" \| "hard-light" \| "hue" \| "lighten" \| "luminosity" \| "multiply" \| "normal" \| "overlay" \| "saturation" \| "screen" \| "soft-light"` | `'multiply'`     |
| `src`                | `src`                 | Background image                              | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `''`             |
